A simple circuit evaluation task
================================

In this section we are going to demonstrate how you can set up a simple 
task for evaluating a circuit's performance. All of the project files 
can be found in `demo/gui/miller/ <../../../demo/gui/miller/>`_

   :maxdepth: 2
   
   gui.task-evaluation.creating.rst
   gui.task-evaluation.settings.rst
   gui.task-evaluation.starting.rst
   gui.task-evaluation.log.rst
   gui.task-evaluation.debugging.rst
